Navigation

AgentBots

List all AgentBots

GET

/

platform

/

api

/

v1

/

agent\_bots

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/platform/api/v1/agent_bots \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

401

Copy

```
[\
  {\
    "id": 123,\
    "name": "<string>",\
    "description": "<string>",\
    "thumbnail": "<string>",\
    "outgoing_url": "<string>",\
    "bot_type": "<string>",\
    "bot_config": {},\
    "account_id": 123,\
    "access_token": "<string>",\
    "system_bot": true\
  }\
]
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/list-all-agentbots#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by the system admin after creating a platformApp. This token should be used to provision agent bots, accounts, users and their roles.

#### Response

200

200401

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/list-all-agentbots#response-id)

id

number

ID of the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/list-all-agentbots#response-name)

name

string

The name of the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/list-all-agentbots#response-description)

description

string

The description about the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/list-all-agentbots#response-thumbnail)

thumbnail

string

The thumbnail of the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/list-all-agentbots#response-outgoing-url)

outgoing\_url

string

The webhook URL for the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/list-all-agentbots#response-bot-type)

bot\_type

string

The type of the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/list-all-agentbots#response-bot-config)

bot\_config

object

The configuration of the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/list-all-agentbots#response-account-id)

account\_id

number

Account ID if it's an account specific bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/list-all-agentbots#response-access-token)

access\_token

string

The access token for the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/list-all-agentbots#response-system-bot)

system\_bot

boolean

Whether the bot is a system bot
